name: simd_short16
desc: A vector of sixteen 16-bit signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short2) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short3) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short4) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short8) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified eight-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short32) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified thirty two-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(simd_short8, simd_short8) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func vector16(simd_short8, simd_short8) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func simd_make_short16_undef(simd_short2) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_short16_undef(simd_short3) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_short16_undef(simd_short4) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_short16_undef(simd_short8) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified eight-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_short16(Int16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_short16_undef(Int16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_char16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_uchar16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_ushort16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_int16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_uint16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short(simd_float16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, floating-point elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_char16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_uchar16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_ushort16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_int16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_uint16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_short_sat(simd_float16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, floating-point elements.

items.name: func simd_abs(simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns the absolute value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_clamp(simd_short16, simd_short16, simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_short16, simd_short16) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_reduce_min(simd_short16) -> Int16
items.desc: Returns the miniumum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_max(simd_short16) -> Int16
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_add(simd_short16) -> Int16
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func simd_min(simd_short16, simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns the minimum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_max(simd_short16, simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns the maximum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_short16, simd_short16, simd_short16) -> simd_short16
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.
